thread.title: This was violence, not a ‘scuffle’
thread.title_full: This was violence, not a ‘scuffle’ - The Washington Post

author: John Woodrow Cox
title: This was violence, not a ‘scuffle’
text:
October 16 at 7:06 PM The Oct. 2 Sports Digest item about Pro Football Hall of Famer Warren Sapp’s plea of no contest to a domestic violence charge described Sapp as having been involved in a “scuffle.” According to The Post’s online article, Sapp is said to have dragged his former girlfriend nearly to the ground, bitten her finger and, later, stepped on her face.
This is not a scuffle. Please do not minimize violence.
Margaret Welsh , Arlington
